thread.title: Ritz Naples golf resort best getaway for the price
thread.title_full: Ritz Naples golf resort best getaway for the price | www.palmbeachpost.com

author: Leslie Gray Streeter
title: Ritz Naples golf resort best getaway for the price
text:
The fanciness hit us on the way down the drive — a long, tree-lined trail to luxury.
Attentive but not pushy — never pushy — young men greet us to take our car and bags, and as we go to the desk, someone hands us a glass of Champagne. On the way down the hall, we walk past a smiling young lady who is making apple-flavored cocktails from a cart. She offers us one. We take her up on it.
